embed_tenants.name: embed_tenants
embed_tenants.description: Embed counts per tenant. Can include embed_types and embed_severities

X-Apigw-Tenant-Locator.name: X-Apigw-Tenant-Locator
X-Apigw-Tenant-Locator.description:
Locator describes hierarchy branch of current tenant.
As separator using '/' symbol

tenantRequired.description: Request must have an identifier of tenant
tenantRequired.name: tenantRequired

rootRequired.description: Requests is allowed for users with root privileges only
rootRequired.name: rootRequired

id.name: id
id.description: IDs of alerts to be selected

query.name: query
query.description: case-insensitive search for value inside planName or resourceName of alert

order.name: order
order.description: Order result by column name. By default means ascending order

validateContext.name: validateContext
validateContext.description: Validate existence of all context fields, described for current alert type

schemaIn.name: schemaIn
schemaIn.description: Schema of alert is described by specified value

skip.name: skip
skip.description: Do not include in response alerts of given ids

methods.description: Get alerts by filter. Filter parameter may be any combination of the following query parameters and context keys/searchable details of alert's type.

Delete alerts by filter. Filter parameter may be any combination of the following query parameters and context keys/searchable details of alert's type. Alert will be deleted even it has `orphaned` flag.

embed_tenants.name: embed_tenants
embed_tenants.description: Whether to group alerts by tenant

embed_types.name: embed_types
embed_types.description: Whether to group alerts by type; mutually exclusive with embed_severities

embed_severities.name: embed_severities
embed_severities.description: Whether to group alerts by severity; mutually exclusive with embed_types

scope_key.name: scope_key
scope_key.description:
Key of parameter from context or searchable details. Results will be
grouped by values of scopes

methods.description: Return last of the most critical alerts grouped by selected scope

modifiedAt.name: modifiedAt
modifiedAt.description:
Last modification time of alerts. If there are no alerts value
equals 'null'

methods.description: Unregister alert type, make all alerts of this type orphaned

id.name: id
id.description: IDs of resources; if omitted response will contain statuses for all resources that have alerts

embed_alert.name: embed_alert
embed_alert.description: if set to true then entire alert view will be included in response

methods.description:
Status contains maximum severity of alert found for that resource. Resource with ID that was not found in
resourceId parameter of any active alert considered to have "ok" severity. Can return multiple records for
one resource if it has multiple alerts with same severity and same creation time.

200.description: Select alert IDs by filter similar to filter of GET /alerts, but without filtering by alert's parameters
